title: HeroTherapy
blurb: A VR exp. for kids during chemo sessions. Chemo within VR makes them superheroes and gives powers to fight cancer.
content_html:
Inspiration

Personal experience. Feeling hopeless and alone during battle with cancer.

What it does

HeroTherapy is an application based on Unity that allows single or multiple users to have a VR experience for chemotherapy sessions for children of cancer clinics. In VR - thank to chemo going through their veins - they are becoming superheroes(!) and with superpowers, destroying cancer cells. The children will feel calmer, stronger, and empowered during their VR chemotherapy session.

How we built it

Unity 3D

Challenges we ran into

We learned about Unity. We have learned about cooperation. Team leadership. Empathy and power of visualisation in medical treatment.

Accomplishments that we're proud of

Our team learned everything that we've made this weekend from scratch.

What we learned

We learned about Unity. We have learned about cooperation. Team leadership. Empathy and power of visualisation in medical treatment.

What's next for Herotherapy

Implementation of a game into global system of oncology clinics

Development of social VR platform to connect children in their chemo session to interact ans support each other

Cooperation with superhero producers / franchaise to join together in good cause and implement�MARVEL, Disney, Harry potter character

Expeding Immersion level to actual usage of saying spells with Magic Wand gestures:�for example „Wingardium Leviosa” will make you fly
